headline: GE Vernova (GEV) Registers a Bigger Fall Than the Market: Important Facts to Note

headline: Coming Fermi IPO Features ‘Donald Trump Nuclear Plant’ to Power AI Data Centers
summary: By 2038, the company expects to be able to generate 11 gigawatts of power—more than five times as much as the Hoover Dam.

headline: GE Vernova Declares Fourth Quarter 2025 Dividend
summary: CAMBRIDGE, Mass., September 25, 2025--GE Vernova (NYSE: GEV) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a $0.25 per share quarterly dividend. The quarterly dividend will be payable on November 17, 2025, to shareholders of record as of October 20, 2025.
